meanings.definition: A rented room consisting of a combined bedroom and sitting room.
meanings.sent1: The bedsits in the building are cozy and affordable.
meanings.sent2: She found a bedsit near her workplace for convenience.
meanings.sent3: Living in a bedsit is like having your own little world.
meanings.sent4: The bedsit became his sanctuary away from the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The bedsit was a perfect blend of comfort and functionality.

meanings.definition: To rent or live in a bedsit.
meanings.sent1: He bedsits in the city to save money on rent.
meanings.sent2: They decided to bedsit together to split the costs.
meanings.sent3: She bedsits happily, enjoying the simplicity of her space.
meanings.sent4: Bedsitting allowed him to be independent while still socializing.
meanings.sent5: They bedsit in the heart of town, close to all the action.
